feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 3:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -13
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
